official_title: A bill to protect the integrity and quality of certain reaches of the Henry's Fork of the Snake River, Idaho, and for other purposes.
short_title: Henry's Fork of the Snake River Protection Act of 1986

summary.text: Henry's Fork of the Snake River Protection Act of 1986 - Prohibits the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) from granting any license or permit for any project proposed to be sited on or adjacent to a certain portion of Henry's Fork of the Snake River, Idaho, including specified tributaries of such River. Exempts the Island Park Dam Hydropower project from such prohibition if FERC determines that no permanent and significant alteration of the water quality will occur.

titles.title: Henry's Fork of the Snake River Protection Act of 1986
A bill to protect the integrity and quality of certain reaches of the Henry's Fork of the Snake River, Idaho, and for other purposes.
